  • Constructor Details

    • Band

      public Band​(double min, double max, boolean flipx, boolean flipy, FunctionTypes ft)
      A Band is an array of colour (RG or B) values. Three of these bands are used by a Palette to create a colour. A function supplies the band range values over a domain of 0.0 to 1.0. The function can be compressed between two values (min,max) and flipped around either or both the x and y axis.
      Parameters:
      min - minimum RGB value
      max - maximum RBG values
      flipx - flip result around the x axis
      flipy - flip result around the y axis
      ft - The function used to map x to y.

  • Method Details

    • getValueAt

      public double getValueAt​(int idx)
      Returns the value of a colour band in the range 0.0 - 1.0 at the given index
      Parameters:
      idx - (0..255)
      Returns:
      band value (0.0..1.0) at index idx
